compatibility.notes: Zimbra-1.3 allows for linking with other licenses but requires that modifications to the Zimbra-1.3 licensed code remain under the same license.

key_requirements: You must have the authority to bind your corporation or entity to this Agreement if acting on their behalf.
You must provide access to the source code when distributing in compiled or object code format.
license.name: Zimbra-1.3
obligations: Distribute source code of the Software or Modifications when distributing in compiled format.
Include a complete copy of the Zimbra Public License with any distribution.
When distributing Modifications, apply the same terms of the Zimbra Public License.
